data.name: Wooorld
data.description:
Dive into Wooorld, a one-of-a-kind social platform bringing a 3D map of the world into your room in Mixed Reality. It’s the best way to explore the world and play games together.

Enjoy Wooorld for Free, or unlock premium add-ons: Explorer+ & Player+.

For Explorers
- Visit cities, landmarks, natural wonders, vacation spots in incredible 3D detail
- Plan trips, save places, share your memories, get answers
- Learn as you explore with rich content from Wikipedia, Google Maps
- Get AI-powered narrated tours about any topic with pictures, reviews and articles and more

For Players
- Play “Where in the Wooorld" to teleport to random locations across 170 countries
- Guess your location based on clues around you
- Collaborate in Coop mode, challenge friends in VS or go solo

Highlights
- 550+ 3D cities, soon expanding to over 2,500 with Google Earth integration
- Billions of Immersive 360 views around the world
- Challenge your geography skills in "Where in the Wooorld" games
- Visual & performance optimizations for Quest 3
- Social presence with expressive 3D avatars with eye/face/hand tracking
- AI-powered Tours and Explore features automatically generate interactive tours of any topic
- Perfect for trip planning with local insight from a global community of helpful explorers
- Customize preferences, map style, detail level and comfort modes
- Integrated educational content for the classroom and tools for educators
- Safe spaces with user reporting, muting and ‘zapping’
